= Resource File Unit =

This unit contains classes that encapsulate Windows 32 bit binary resource files and the resources contained in them. The main functionality is provided by two classes. In addition some helper functions, an exception class and some constants are also provided.

|| _[TPJResourceFile TPJResourceFile]_ || Encapsulates the contents of a whole resource files and provides methods and properties to search, enumerate and manipulate them. ||
|| _[TPJResourceEntry TPJResourceEntry]_ || Encapsulates a single resource within a resource file and provides properties to access its header record and its raw data. ||
|| [ResFileRoutines Helper Routines] || Routines to assist in working with resource identifiers. ||
|| [ResFileConsts Constants] || Constants for use with the memory flags field of resource header records along with declarations of resource types not defined by all supported versions of Delphi. ||
|| _EPJResourceFile_ || Class of exceptions that are raised directly by _[TPJResourceFile TPJResourceFile]_ and _[TPJResourceEntry TPJResourceEntry]_. The class defines no new methods or properties. ||
